scripts.dev-init: git submodule init && git submodule update && (for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && git checkout $B && git pull); done) && (cd doc && git checkout master -f && git pull) && npm run dev-install && npm run dev-check
scripts.dev-check: npm run dev-tslint && npm run dev-tsc && npm run dev-test
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-normalize && npm run dev-check && npm run dev-doc
scripts.dev-install: npm install && npm run dev-install-packages && npm run dev-set-links && npm run dev-use-links
scripts.dev-install-packages: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd $p && npm i); done
scripts.dev-set-links: for p in ./packages/*; do npm link $p; done
scripts.dev-use-links: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && npm run dev-link); done
scripts.dev-normalize: for p in ./packages/*; do cp -a ./normalize/. $p/; done
scripts.dev-tsc: (cd ./packages/ancient-mixins; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-cursor; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-channels; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-peer; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-funicular; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-asket; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-babilon; npm run tsc) && (cd ./packages/ancient-tracker; npm run tsc)
scripts.dev-tslint: for p in ./packages/*; do (cd "$p" && npm run tslint); done
scripts.dev-doc: find ./doc/ ! -name '.git' ! -name 'doc' -exec rm -rf {} + && touch ./doc/.nojekyll && typedoc --readme ./README.md --name "AncientSouls Documentation" --module commonjs --out ./doc/ --excludeExternals --exclude "**/+(node_modules|tests)/**" --disableOutputCheck --ignoreCompilerErrors --includes includes ./packages
scripts.dev-acp-packages: for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd $p && echo "$p" && git add . -A && git commit --quiet -m "$M" && git push --quiet --all origin); done
scripts.dev-acp-dev: git add . -A && echo "./" && git commit --quiet -m "$M" && git push --quiet --all origin
scripts.dev-acp-doc: (cd doc && echo "doc" && git add . -A && git commit --quiet -m "$M" && git push --quiet --all origin)
scripts.dev-acp: npm run dev-acp-dev && npm run dev-acp-doc && npm run dev-acp-packages
scripts.dev-test: for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd "$p" && echo "$p" && npm run test); done
scripts.dev-np: for p in ./packages/* ; do (cd $p && npm run np); done
